0.title: The Shoe Store
0.description: An ecommerce website for shoes made using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript to deliver a robust, scalable, and visually appealing platform for online shoe shopping.

1.title: We Commerce
1.description: A platform which offers a streamlined solution for building ecommerce websites, utilizing HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.js. It enables users to create professional-looking online stores in just minutes.

2.title: Space Station
2.description:
A space-related search platform where you can search anything related to space and get information about it

Technology used : HTML, CSS, JavaScript
